name: Input Chaos
description:
Input Chaos is a physics based multiplayer fighting game.



FEATURES :

  • All moves are your sticks moves.
  • Nervous ragdolls with brutal weapons.
  • Cinematic slow motions.
  • Aggressive AIs designed to ignore mercy.


NOTES :

  • Development is still ongoing. Future improvements and funny bugs are expected.
  • The controls of the game can be surprising. Please try the demo first.
  • No dedicated online multiplayer. (for now, you can try steam's "remote play together", not tested.)
  • Controllers/Gamepads only. (you need the dual sticks)
